title: The Satanic Verses and the Fatwa
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Satanic Verses and the Fatwa.

hook.text: A novel sparked an international death sentence. Salman Rushdie lived in hiding for nearly a decade.

buildup.text: The Satanic Verses, published in 1988, included a fictionalized portrayal some Muslims found blasphemous.

punchline.text: Thirty years later, the fatwa still echoed in violence.
